data.title: Valerija Perger Age, Birthday, Zodiac Sign and Birth Chart
data.meta_description: Astrology details of Valerija Perger such as age, birthday, zodiac sign, and natal chart. Analyze their birth chart and kundli to understand their personality and cause of death through astrology.
data.text:
Valerija Perger is a Slovenian educator, lecturer, pedagogical advisor, and author of textbooks. Born on May 19, 1959, in Okoslavci, she completed her primary education in Sveti Jurij ob Ščavnici and her secondary education in Murska Sobota. She graduated from the Faculty of Arts in Ljubljana in 1984. She worked at a bilingual secondary school teaching Hungarian, and later as a senior pedagogical advisor in Slovenia's Porabje region. She authored several reading materials and textbooks for Slovenian language education.
